CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Using PBDT-TDPP-S as electron donor and [6,6]-phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) as electron acceptor , the resulting polymer solar cells exhibited outstanding photovoltaic properties with a power conversion efficiency of 4.89% , an open - circuit voltage of 0.84 V , a short - circuit current of 10.04 mA cm^-2 , and a fill factor of 56.0% .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. PBDT-TDPP-S
2. [6,6]-phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM)

These are the names of the materials used in the polymer solar cells.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph:

1. PBDT-TDPP-S
2. PC71BM

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph presented as a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PBDT-TDPP-S |
| PC71BM |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Using PBDT-TDPP-S as electron donor and [6,6]-phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) as electron acceptor , the resulting polymer solar cells exhibited outstanding photovoltaic properties with a power conversion efficiency of 4.89% , an open - circuit voltage of 0.84 V , a short - circuit current of 10.04 mA cm^-2 , and a fill factor of 56.0% .

Let's think step by step.

In this paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Value" entities:

1. Power conversion efficiency: 4.89%
2. Open-circuit voltage (Voc): 0.84 V
3. Short-circuit current density (Jsc): 10.04 mA cm^-2
4. Fill factor (FF): 56.0%

These entities are properties of the solar cells that are being described in the paragraph, and they provide information about the performance of the cells in terms of their ability to convert sunlight into electrical energy.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the paragraph:

1. Power conversion efficiency: 4.89%
2. Open-circuit voltage (Voc): 0.84 V
3. Short-circuit current density (Jsc): 10.04 mA cm^-2

These are the entities that provide information about the performance of the solar cells in terms of their ability to convert sunlight into electrical energy, which is a material property.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph, presented as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 4.89% |
| 0.84 V |
| 10.04 mA cm^-2 |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
